Description: Fragment of leather and linen book-binding; affixed gilded leather panels decorated with punched-line representations of Christ Emmanuel and the four evangelists, each labeled with Coptic text.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Boudalis, G. The Codex and Crafts in late Antiquity, Bard Graduate Center 2018, fig. 83.
Bibliographic references: Shore 1971-1972 / Fragment of a decorated leather binding from Egypt (image on pl.26)
